name: Latitud 49 Apart

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Latitud 49 is a new B&B in El Chalten, started at the beginning of this year. We found it via Internet when searching the web for a sleepingplace. We had a large room with a hugh and very good bed and a brandnew bathroom, incuding a nice view on Fitz Roy. The breakfast was good as well and the owner gave us good advicee about the different trakking options to Fitz Roy.
reviews.title: The best Bed & Breakfast during our 3 months trip in Argentina

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: A comfy and well equipped artment, we really enjoyed our stay here. It's with 5 minutes of a small corner shop and 10 minutes of the town center and restaurants. The owners were lovely and very helpful.
reviews.title: Ideal spot to relax

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed for 3 nights in this B&B and had a clean, spacious room upstairs with a magnificant view on Fitzroy (provided there was good wheater of coarse). After 3,5 weeks of traveling from the south to the north of Argentina we concluded this was one of the best places we had stayed. Florencia (the owner) really knows a lot about the mountains and the different hikes you can make and gave us some really good advise. The breakfast is basic (no complaints though)... and the pizza's downstairs at pizzaria Patagonikus are not to be missed. We really enjoyed our stay here. Good WIFI is available in the room.
reviews.title: An exquisite place to stay

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We had an upstairs room which was huge, nicely decorated, great views and extremely comfortable queen bed. The owner was very helpful. Really nothing bad to say about this place at all - it's the best value place we stayed in Argentina. El Chalten is also fantastic.
reviews.title: Wonderful stay

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My husband and I spent a lovely night at the Latitud B&B in El Chaten. It was a great room -- large and spacious with a terrific bathroom ensuite -- incredibly clean and comfortable, in an ideal location. Florencia was wonderful. We highly recommend both this B&B as well as a stay in El Chalten.
reviews.title: Fantastic!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We spent 5 days in Latitud 49, I found Latitud 49 apparts really confortable and at good price for the service it offers. Appart is very clean, really confortable, it has a TV with films, WiFi connection, kitchenette to prepare something to eat for the trekking days...
reviews.title: A good option for accomodation at El Chalten
Great accomodation in El Chalten.
reviews.text: The family in charge of the apartment is really kind and they are always helping you to make your stay as good as possible.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Perfect option if you visit El Chalten.
reviews.title: Enjoyed our stay at Latitud 49!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The room was spacious and cozy at the same time, with a nice view. Florencia was very helpful and speaks English much better than she says she does! We had a wonderful time.
reviews.title: Highly recommended

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My wife and I thoroughly enjoyed our stay here. The room was clean and had a great view of the mountains and the staff was quite nice and chatted with us in the morning while we ate breakfast.
reviews.title: Cute and Cozy

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Stayed 3 nights in El Chalten in October 2010, and it was indeed our favourite hotel in Argentina!!
reviews.title: Our favourite hotel in Argentina

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Florencia is the host, and everything she did for us (which was quite a lot!) was brilliant. From booking our bus trip from El Calafate, to providing maps for us to walk a different route up to Fitz Roy, to suggesting the most amazing little restaurant (La Tapera), to even posting our postcards for us (just to get an El Chalten postage mark!).... Florencia is the best!
reviews.title: Stay here!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The breakfast provided each morning was fresh pastries, and a top selection of jams, cereals (with yoghurt) and teas, all served with a smile. The rooms have been designed and built by the owner, with great views of Mount Fitz Roy.
reviews.title: We couldn't have been happier

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: If its sunny in the morning (as we were very fortunate for both our mornings)... get walking up that hill! Its well worth the effort!.
reviews.title: Lovely place

reviews.text: Florencia, if you manage to read this... Many thanks for your wonderful hospitality, and for posting my postcards (!), and we wish you all the very best for the future!
reviews.title: very comfortable

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Latitud 49 was a lovely place to say goodbye to 2010 and hello to 2011. The small room, which we stayed in, was simple and perfect for our needs. No TV, but really, who goes to El Chalten to watch TV! The bathroom was beautifully tiled, and the shower was luxurious, especially after those 14 mile hikes to Tres Lagos! It felt like a much higher end place than what we paid for it. It's close to many restaurants and the hiking trails as well as the bus station - important when you need to catch the 6:30 am bus out! Great views of FitzRoy from the front deck too.
reviews.title: A lovely place to ring in the New Year

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We loved the Latitud 49 Apartment which is located away from the main B&B. The place was well furnished, had a kitchen with all the cooking utinsels, a flat screen TV with movies and even came with a selection of teas and coffees. The owners were PERFECT. They live downstairs and their beautiful family made our trip to El Chalten one to remember!
reviews.title: Spend a Little Extra and Stay at the Latitud 49 Apartment!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Our only regret is only staying one night. If we could do it again, we would have cut our time in El Chalten short to enjoy 1-2 extra nights here. The apartment was the highlight of our trip and the town itself was fabulous (great food, nightlife, brewery, and steps away from hiking).
reviews.title: A Great B&B in El Chalten

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We spent three nights in El Chalten and stayed in Latiud 49 which is run by Francesca. There are three rooms in the B&B. We stayed in the superior room which is very comfortable and spacious. Breakfast is simple (cereal, choice of breads and tea/coffee). Francesca is an excellent host, gives very good advice and has excellent English. The B&B is located in the centre of El Chalten and there is no problem with parking.
reviews.title: Perfect stay

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The weather was very good for our stay which apparently is a rarity there. El Chalten is a long way from anywhere, about a 2.5hr/3hr car drive from the much more commercialised El Calafate. You can also get there by bus from El Calafate.
reviews.title: Fantastic B&B in great location

description: We have two apartments accommodating up to 4 people each. The apartments have a bedroom with a double bed + a single bed, and an extra single bed in the living room; private bathroom; fully equipped kitchen (fridge, microwave, kitchen utensils and set of saucepans); water central heating and hot water 24 hours a day. Linen and cleaning service are included (it doesn`t include the dish washing ), wi-fi.
